title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to bioprocesses, definitions of biomass, cell mass, substrates, nutrients, products. Density Measurement, hydrometers and absorption type; Level and Flow Measurement, ultrasonic and laser anemometry; Viscosity and Temperature Measurement; (Electrical) Conductivity Measurement; Densitometry, Colorimetry, and Turbidity Measurement; Composition Measurement, electrochemical, thermal, kinetic methods; Chromatographic composition measurement; pH and Water quality Measurement; Dissolved O2 and evolved CO2 Meas.; In-situ Measurement of bio-process variables, Software sensors, stream inferencing of variables; Actuators and Controllers.
